text: New Balance is one of the world's major sports footwear and apparel manufacturers. It is based in Boston, Massachusetts. It was founded in 1906 as the New Balance Arch Support Company. New Balance maintains a manufacturing presence in the United States, as well as in the United Kingdom for the European market, where it produces some of its popular models. == Other websites == * Category:1906 establishments in the United States Category:1900s establishments in Massachusetts Category:American clothing companies Category:Footwear Category:Companies based in Boston
title: New Balance
